    IForgeItem.getAttributeModifiers(EquipmentSlot slot, ItemStack stack)
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    In favor of IForgeItem.getDefaultAttributeModifiers(ItemStack) as it matches vanilla name, and not all cases that call this has the EquipmentSlot argument
